Class EspressoStand

  • java.lang.Object
    • EspressoStand

  • public class EspressoStand
extends java.lang.Object
    The EspressoStand class maintains inventory and total sales records for an espresso stand and also processes orders and requests for reports.
    Version:
    11/10/11
    Author:
    Chun-Wei Chen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double COST_OF_COOKIE 
      static double COST_OF_DOUBLE_SHORT 
      static double COST_OF_DOUBLE_TALL 
      static double COST_OF_SINGLE_SHORT 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EspressoStand()
      Constructs a new EspressoStand with 1000 shots, 8000 ounces of milk, 1000 cookies, 1000 cups, and 0 total sales.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getInventory()
      Show how many shots, ounces of milk, cookies and cups remain in the inventory.
      double getTotalSales()
      Get the total sales.
      double processOrder(Order request)
      This method calculates the price of this order (the argument passed in cannot be null).

        public EspressoStand()

    • Method Detail

      • getTotalSales

        public double getTotalSales()
        Get the total sales.
        Returns:
        the total sales

      • getInventory

        public java.lang.String getInventory()
        Show how many shots, ounces of milk, cookies and cups remain in the inventory.
        Returns:
        the inventory report

      • processOrder

        public double processOrder(Order request)
        This method calculates the price of this order (the argument passed in cannot be null). It updates the number of shots, ounces of milk, cookies and cups in the inventory when the items are sold. It also updates the total sales to include this order.
        Parameters:
        request - an Order
        Returns:
        the price of this order
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the request is null
